item.title: GSK To Acquire RAPT Therapeutics In $2.2 Billion Bet On Food Allergy Breakthrough
item.description: GSK plc to acquire RAPT Therapeutics Inc. for $58.00 per share, with an estimated upfront investment of $1.9 billion. read more

item.title: Trump's Former State Secretary Slams Canada's Move To Allow Chinese EVs: 'A Grave Strategicâ€¦Error'
item.description: Mike Pompeo criticizes Canadian PM Carney's EV And Canola oil tariff deal with China, calling it a grave error. read more

item.title: Meta's Recent Stock Decline Is 'Self-Inflicted,' Says Analyst, Predicts Rally If Mark Zuckerberg Does This
item.description: Eric Lynch addresses concerns about Meta's stock decline due to increased capex and AI push by CEO Mark Zuckerberg. read more

item.title: Barrick Names Veteran Deal-Maker Helen Cai As CFO
item.description: Barrick Mining (B) shares climbed after naming Helen Cai CFO effective March 2026, tapping her 20+ years of finance experience. read more

item.title: 'This Is One Of The Most Testing Moments For Leaders,' PwC Chairman Mohamed Kande Says As 56% Of Companies Get 'Nothing Out Of' AI
item.description: PwC's global chairman warns corporate leaders rushing into AI without foundational systems, leaving majority with no real benefit. read more
